body: Someone was recently banned for using regen hacks while being spawn killed. Now i'm not trying to appeal for them, but I'm saying that I think Para put it so that you have resistance 10 after you spawn for a short while.
body_tagged: Someone was recently banned for using regen hacks while being spawn killed. Now i'm not trying to appeal for them, but I'm saying that I think Para put it so that you have resistance 10 after you spawn for a short while.
title: "Regen" Hacks
